briefdescription.para: An external application that manages its own data and data model.

detaileddescription.para: To plug in outside data sources, one can use

listitem.para: VariableNodes with a data source (functions that are called for read and write access)
An external nodestore that is mapped to specific namespaces

detaileddescription.para: If no external nodestore is defined for a nodeid, it is always looked up in the "local" nodestore of open62541. Namespace Zero is always in the local nodestore.
